name: 3D Flying Snake
description:
Fly around a 3d arena and grow longer as you collect fruit while trying not to crash in to yourself.

So far the game features 3 game modes:

  • Classic Survival - Grow every time you eat and gain a small amount of speed
  • Blitz - Gain speed 20x faster than classic
  • Checkpoint - Rapidly grow until you reach your highest unlocked checkpoint cutting out unnecessary repetition. 

Controls

  • WSAD, Arrows, Mouse = Pitch/Yaw
  • Q/E = Roll
  • Space = Boost
  • B = Boost Toggle
  • 1/2 = 1st/3rd person
  • P = Pause
  • U = Unpause

The game also features local highscores, badges and a lot of options to customise your playstyle. Some joysticks will work but aren't fully supported yet.

Future releases will include

  • More maps and modes
  • Improved graphics
  • Various API integrations
  • Split screen
  • Custom snake editor
